title: Yolomouse
body: Is Yolomouse an acceptable third-party software? It is a program that allows you to change your cursor in the game. ( https://pandateemo.github.io/YoloMouse/ )

replies.body: I haven't heard of this before, but if it's changing your in-game cursor then you could face penalties for causing an unfair advantage.  We don't support modifications or third parties either, and we can't be sure of malicious contents hiding inside them.  Check out our[ third party guide,](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848) and be safe!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=UMzxBNpQ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-12T22:12:38.597+0000)
>
> I haven't heard of this before, but if it's changing your in-game cursor then you could face penalties for causing an unfair advantage.  We don't support modifications or third parties either, and we can't be sure of malicious contents hiding inside them.  Check out our[ third party guide,](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848) and be safe!

Why is changing the cursor an "unfair advantage" though? In other games like CS:GO and Dota 2 you can freely change your cursor without it being called an unfair advantage.

I would also like to ask why changing your cursor is allowed on the EUW server, but not on the NA server?  ( https://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/aiuto-e-supporto-it/w2Em8J1e-richiesta-chiarimento-puntatore-mouse-personalizzato?comment=0004 )

Modifications aren't supported, especially if it's occurring in-game.  If the cursor is adjusting the way which you make selections then it could certainly be perceived that way.  I'm afraid I don't know the language in that post or have a lot of visibility outside of the NA region.  :/  

I'm not part of our Risk or PB team so I couldn't tell you definitively that you would get banned, but I am trying to keep you safe from such a risk.  Hit us up in [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our PB team can offer you more context directly.
